mapper.select: select id, `name`, scene_id, data_source_id, `type`, `mode`, `info`, create_by, create_time, ( SELECT nick_name FROM sys_user WHERE sys_user.username = dataset_table.create_by ) AS creator_name from dataset_table where id = #{datasetTableId}

select id, `name`, scene_id, data_source_id, `type`, `mode`, `info`, create_by, create_time, get_auths(id, 'dataset', #{userId}) as `privileges` from dataset_table where id in (SELECT table_id FROM chart_view WHERE id IN (SELECT chart_view_id FROM panel_view WHERE panel_id = #{panelId}))
select dataset_table.* from dataset_table where id in (SELECT table_id FROM chart_view WHERE id IN (SELECT chart_view_id FROM panel_view WHERE panel_id = #{panelId}))
